DOC.brief_title: Radiolabel Study In Healthy Volunteers For Insomnia-Targeting Drug
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male , age 3055 year inclusive . Body weight equal 50kg BMI ( body mass index ) 18.529.9kg/m2 inclusive . Healthy base medical evaluation consist medical history , physical examination , lab test blood urine cardiovascular monitoring . LH , FSH testosterone hormone must within normal reference range . Exclusion criterion : Positive urine drug screen alcohol breath test screen visit . Average weekly alcohol intake 21 unit average daily intake 3 unit . Grapefruit grapefruit juice intake 7 day dose last blood sample take . Any subject prepare eat standard meal clinic vegetarian . Participated clinical trial new drug within 30 day 5 halflives twice duration drug effect dose day study . Exposure 4 new drug clinical trial within last 12 month dose study . Use medication ( prescribed nonprescribed include vitamin herbal supplement ) within 7 day dose study . Participation study would result subject donate 500ml 56 day period . Regular use tobacco nicotinecontaining product within 6 month screen . Unwillingness abstain sexual intercourse pregnant lactate woman dose 84 day . Unwillingness use contraception female partner use contraception could become pregnant 84 day dose . Unwillingness abstain strenuous physical activity 48 hour screen 72 hour 48 hour treatment period . Administration radiolabelled substance exposure significant radiation ( eg serial Xrays CT scan , barium meal etc ) within past 12 month screen .
